## Color4.FromColor3() method

Creates a new Color4 from a Color3 and an alpha value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromColor3(color3: Color3, alpha?: number): Color4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  color3 | <code>Color3</code> | defines the source Color3 to read from |
|  alpha | <code>number</code> | defines the alpha component (1.0 by default) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color4`

a new Color4 object
